Plot: In this comedy film, a computer tablet full of the world's most hilariously offensive apps breaks through the borders of political correctness, stirring up cultural anarchy.
Title: InAPPropriate Comedy
Writer: Ken Pringle, Ari Shaffir, Vince Offer, Adrien Brody (additional dialogue written by), Christina Pazsitzky (additional dialogue written by), John Ryan Jr. (additional dialogue written by), Dante (additional dialogue written by)
Actors: Rob Schneider, Michelle Rodriguez, Adrien Brody, Lindsay Lohan
